item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Xkcd 1425 (Tasks) turns ten years old today (270 points | 110 comments)
2. Orion, our first true augmented reality glasses (912 points | 702 comments)
3. Show HN: Cronexpr, a Rust library to parse and iter crontab expression (60 points | 9 comments)
4. Git-absorb: Git commit –fixup, but automatic (230 points | 106 comments)
5. Llama 3.2: Revolutionizing edge AI and vision with open, customizable models (589 points | 188 comments)
6. Hoodmaps: Publicly Annotated City Maps (13 points | 3 comments)
7. WiFi suspended at big UK train stations after 'cybersecurity incident' (13 points | 6 comments)
8. Launch HN: Haystack (YC S24) – Visualize and edit code on an infinite canvas (257 points | 137 comments)
9. Rewriting Rust (202 points | 149 comments)
10. Eliminating Memory Safety Vulnerabilities at the Source (190 points | 90 comments)
11. The lost language extensions of MetaWare's High C compiler (2023) (258 points | 85 comments)
12. Wordpress.org bans WP Engine, blocks it from accessing its resources (15 points | 4 comments)
13. GitHub-events-viewer a.k.a. "What did I do yesterday?" (27 points | 5 comments)
14. Show HN: Httpdbg – A tool to trace the HTTP requests sent by your Python code (148 points | 44 comments)
15. Shizuku: App that lets you use system APIs with higher privileges without root (17 points | 3 comments)
16. Timeshare owner? The Mexican drug cartels want you (167 points | 180 comments)
17. How to avoid a BSOD on your 2B dollar spacecraft (129 points | 103 comments)
18. Moerenuma Park: A Giant, Gorgeous 'Living Sculpture' in Hokkaido (18 points | 3 comments)
19. Rearchitecting: Redis to SQLite (295 points | 101 comments)
20. Show HN: King Thirteen: 2048 with chess pieces, in under 13 KB (171 points | 55 comments)
21. Audio Masking (115 points | 16 comments)
22. Why I still blog after 15 years (392 points | 202 comments)
23. Just 5k people use the Rabbit R1 every day (11 points | 12 comments)
24. Clara (YC S24) Is Hiring a Head of Growth ( | hide)
25. Mira Murati leaves OpenAI (639 points | 439 comments)
26. Optimizing Guile Scheme (153 points | 55 comments)
27. Show HN: Coros – A Modern C++ Library for Task Parallelism (95 points | 44 comments)
28. Show HN: Fast and Exact Algorithm for Image Merging (99 points | 29 comments)
29. Capstone Disassembler Framework (76 points | 26 comments)
30. Who is Marcellus Williams: Execution in Missouri despite evidence of innocence (283 points | 336 comments)
item.guid: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, September 26, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
